title: Trump Organization's accounting firm says 10 years of financial statements are unreliable - CNN
content:
1. Trump Organization's accounting firm says 10 years of financial statements are unreliable  CNN
  2. Accounting Firm Cuts Ties With Trump and Retracts Financial Statements  The New York Times
  3. Accounting Firm Cuts Ties With Trump Organization, Retracts Financial Statements  NBC News
  4. Donald Trump's accountants quit — in the midst of preparing his and Melania's taxes — after questioning 'discrepancies'  Yahoo News
  5. Donald Trump, Canada, Valentine’s Day: Your Monday Evening Briefing  The New York Times
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Former President Donald Trump's long-time accounting firm informed the Trump Organization last week that it should no longer rely on nearly 10 years' worth of financial statements and that they would no longer be their accountants, citing a conflict of interest.
